title: Süper incir (2013)
storyline: Seikilos, who wrote the first song of the history in Tralleis, wakes up in a small Agean village after two thousand years of sleep. He challenges funny Agean villagers to get back his love Euterpe. Mustafa, a young fanciful villager, finds a piece of paper in his grandfather's chest and starts an adventure to find out his mystery. Eventually Mustafa encounters Seikilos for his only love Hatice whose appearance is the same with Euterpe.
